name: Collect the scrap!
description:
Collect the scrap!

You are an astronaut lost in space. 

You need to collect the scrap to repair your ship.

Made for the BearJamFall2021 in 40h.

I started programming 2 months ago and this is the first game I ever finished. So dont have hight expectations.

Sounds and music were created by me.

I used the 2D Extra package from GitHub.
